alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 4:57PM MST until September 22 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 845 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Running washes will create a hazard for some unbridged road crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 457 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bullard Wash, Date Creek, Santa Maria River, and smaller washes feeding into Centennial Wash and Cunningham Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alamo State Park, Old Alamo Road, Wickenburg Road, Date Creek Road, and Old Ranch Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
